indecent.translation[0].definitions[0].d: something that is indecent is shocking and offensive, usually because it involves sex or shows parts of the body that are usually covered
indecent.translation[0].definitions[0].e: He was found guilty of possessing indecent photographs.
You can’t go out in that dress – it’s positively indecent!
indecent.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The funeral formalities were performed with almost indecent haste.
